channel.title: research on deskriders
channel.description: Recent content in research on deskriders

item.title: VIX yearly highest values over the last 20 years
item.description: Started as a question from this tweet I downloaded ^VIX data from Yahoo Finance using this script. https://github.com/namuan/trading-utils/blob/main/download_stocks_ohlcv.py uvr download_stocks_ohlcv.py --tickers ^VIX --back-period-in-years 20 Assuming the output data is download in a CSV file output/\^VIX.csv I imported the CSV data in an Sqlite3 database $ sqlite3 vix.db In the Sqlite3 prompt CREATE TABLE vix_prices ( date TIMESTAMP, adj_close REAL, close REAL, high REAL, low REAL, open REAL, volume INTEGER ); .
